headline: Caterpillar, Hunt Energy Partner On Data Center Power Push, Starting In Texas
summary: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) and Hunt Energy Company, L.P. announced on Thursday a strategic partnership to develop independent energy systems for data centers. The deal focuses on delivering reliable, always-available power to support rising digital infrastructure demand. The collaboration combines Caterpillar’s power system expertise with Hunt’s infrastructure and financing capabilities. The first project will roll out in Texas, with plans to expand across North America. The companies expect to

headline: Caterpillar and Hunt Energy Company, L.P. Sign Long-Term Strategic Agreement to Deliver Power Solutions for Data Centers
summary: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE: CAT) and Hunt Energy Company, L.P. (Hunt Energy) today announced a long-term strategic collaboration agreement focused on delivering highly efficient, independent energy production. With customer success at the core of every project, this collaboration will ensure reliability and performance is delivered to meet the demanding "always-on" needs for data centers.

headline: Does Caterpillar’s Recent 24% Rally Signal Room for Growth in 2025?
summary: If you are looking at Caterpillar stock and wondering whether it is time to buy, sell, or simply hold your ground, you are not alone. With major infrastructure projects and renewed optimism around the American manufacturing sector fueling interest, Caterpillar has had an impressive run. Its share price is up more than 24% over the past year. In just the previous three months, the stock surged over 21%, and since the start of the year, it has notched a nearly 17% gain. These moves have caught...

headline: Why Caterpillar and John Deere are counting the costs of Trump administration tariffs
summary: Caterpillar is facing as much as $1.5 billion in tariff-related costs in 2025 but is keeping revenue guidance above 2024 levels.
